title: Current bug with Flash summoner
body: Unless I am mistaken, if you queue up a spell then flash onto someone the spell should automatically cast.  It's not doing this anymore.

replies.body:
It appears this was an unintended change as a result of some re-coding to how spell casts work. Looks like the dudes who need to know are aware so hopefully this will be fixed.

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3lbk5g/did_they_ninja_nerf_flash/
It only does this with some spells not all
